alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:23PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tuscaloosa, northeastern Pickens and southern Fayette Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1023 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashcraft Corner, or 11 miles northeast of Gordo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Berry, Ashcraft Corner, Boley Springs, Samantha, Stone Wall, Wiley, Moores Bridge, Windham Springs, Lubbub and New Lexington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and west central Alabama.
